title: Covered Cup with Serpent Handle
displaydate: c. 1620/1630 (all but stem and mounts); late 16th century (stem);  late 19th century (mounts)
attribution: Freiburg-im-Breisgau 17th Century (cup, cover, probably foot, finial with serpent; Probably Italian 16th Century (stem); Western European 19th Century (mounts)
